metadata.Title: CVE-2022-22815 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
path_getbbox in path.c in Pillow before 9.0.0 improperly initializes ImagePath.Path.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-22815` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pil - 8.1.2+dfsg-0.3ubuntu0.1
python3-pil.imagetk - 8.1.2+dfsg-0.3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.1.2+dfsg-0.3ubuntu0.1').
